Name: Trinity Shaper
Changelog:
Three-Body Technology Trinity Shaper - Changelog

Version 1.1.0 (Jan 17, 2025)
New Features:
- Added gain adjustment knobs for each band in multi-band mode.
- Added a button to toggle the processing order between Makeup and Limiter.
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed a bug where the monitoring status displayed incorrectly after reopening the window.
- Fixed a bug where dialog boxes displayed incorrectly in some cases.
- Fixed a bug where preset names and modification statuses were displayed incorrectly.
Improvements:
- A setting has been added for the side chain EQ that, when enabled, will display a parameter value monitor for the selected band, supporting drag-and-drop editing and double-click input editing.
- Added a status indicator to show when sidechain mode and sidechain EQ are active (displayed on the sidechain button).
- Improved visibility of frequency settings for bands in multi-band mode.
- The ‘alt’ key is now displayed as ‘option’ in the settings on Mac version.
- Added the ability to set background images in the theme settings.

Version 1.0.0 (Sep 12, 2024)
- Initial release

Name: Needlepoint
Changelog:
Unfiltered Audio Needlepoint - Changelog

Version 1.0.7 (Jan 31, 2025)
- Fix for infinite loop causing crash on Apple Silicon

Version 1.0.6 (Mar 16, 2023)
- Add AAX ARM support for Apple Silicon.

Version 1.0.5 (Mar 01, 2023)
- Fix latency reporting causing Cubase issues when plugin is bypassed.

Version 1.0.4 (Feb 24, 2023)
- Bundle previous changes for release on Mac and Windows.
- Credits page was always printing "1.0.0". Fixed.

Version 1.0.3 (Dec 7, 2022)
- Remove OpenGL on iOS to fix rendering on many devices.

Version 1.0.2 (Nov 29, 2022)
- Fix latency reporting for certain DAWs, especially on iOS.
- Optimize visualizers. Reduce unneeded repaint calls and limit maximum frame rate to prevent runaway CPU usage.
- Fix for mono rendering on visualizer.
- Add ability to disable the visualizer to conserve CPU.
- Fix rare situation where colors wouldn't update properly.

Version 1.0.1 (Oct 7, 2022)
- Fix for situations where multiple instances of Needlepoint could cause crashing, especially on sample rate change.

Version 1.0.0 (Aug 25, 2022)
- Initial Release

Name: Cenozoix Compressor
Changelog:
Three Body Technology Cenozoix Compressor - Changelog

Version 1.1.1 (Jan 17, 2025)
Bug Fixes:
- Fixed a bug where dialog boxes displayed incorrectly in some cases.
- Fixed a bug where preset names and modification statuses were displayed incorrectly.
Improvements:
- A setting has been added for the side chain EQ that, when enabled, will display a parameter value monitor for the selected band, supporting drag-and-drop editing and double-click input editing.
- Added a status indicator to show when sidechain mode and sidechain EQ are active (Displayed on the sidechain button).
- Added 3dB, 1dB and 0 dB options for the waveform display's maximum dB setting (in display panel).
- Added -6 dB and -3 dB options for the waveform display's minimum dB setting (in display panel).
- The ‘alt’ key is now displayed as ‘option’ in the settings on Mac version.
- Added the ability to set background images in the theme settings.

Version 1.1.0 (Apr 19, 2024)
- Implemented "Drive" modelling: Extra harmonic distortions for each of 24 vintage and modern compressor styles with adjustable drive levels. Enables you to mix and match a compressor style with a different drive style
- Implemented "Post-Makeup Dry Mix" that allows to mix dry and wet signals after makeup processing.
- Implemented compact mode with hidden waveform and threshold panels

Version 1.0.1 (Feb 21, 2024)
Bug Fixes
- Oversampling now works correctly. Fixed the issue that some internal DSP codes remain at the original sample rate instead of being initialized to a higher sample rate when oversampling is enabled, which may cause the missing low end.
- Fixed an issue with latency compensation which causes phase issues when mixing dry and wet signals.
- Undo in Logic now works correctly.
- Fixed the incorrect display of Hold parameter when reopening the GUI.
- Now knob fine tuning with Shift works correctly on macOS.
Optimizations
- New oversampling IR kernel that improves the sound quality while slightly increasing the latency.
- Now supports the gain reduction meter display in Studio One.

Version 1.0.0 (Feb 6, 2024)
- Initial Release
